attributes.action: Change car insurance to make it affordable or non mandatory!
attributes.additional_details: As a 17-year-old female mechanic, the exorbitant cost of car insurance is a struggle that I and many other young people all over the country face. The incredibly high quotes—between 6 and 10 thousand pounds a year are taking most of my hard-earned wages. This is not right.
attributes.background: Low prices/ price cap it, regulate insurance cost or reconsider the legal requirement of car insurance.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action: 

Remove requirement to have motor insurance unless you have past driving offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707255\

Cap car insurance prices
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703058

Ban higher car insurance premiums for young and new drivers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709463

Review the car insurance industry and car insurance premiums
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714562
